abstract: In an effort to open up the field for trading shares in private placements, Merrill Lynch, Lehman Brothers, Morgan Stanley and Citigroup are developing their own electronic trading platform, The Financial Times reported.
lead_paragraph: In an effort to open up the field for trading shares in private placements, Merrill Lynch, Lehman Brothers, Morgan Stanley and Citigroup are developing their own electronic trading platform, The Financial Times reported.

headline.main: Banks to Create New Trading Platform for Private Shares
